question: What is the asosciation between the eustachian tube and the palatine muscle of the uvula?
ideal_answer: Palatal musculature is known to be responsible for the active opening of the eustachian  tube.

snippets.text: Palatal musculature is known to be responsible for the active opening of the eustachian (auditory) tube. Because laser-assisted uvulopalatoplasty (LAUP) may involve partial division of these muscles, the effect of this procedure on middle ear pressures (MEPs) and middle ear volumes (MEVs)
